news.title: Trump nominates Kevin Warsh for Federal Reserve chair to succeed Jerome Powell
news.summary: President Trump named Kevin Warsh to succeed Jerome Powell as Fed chair. Warsh's appointment ends an odyssey that has seen unprecedented turmoil around the central bank.

news.title: Ford to record $600 million pretax pension charge in fourth quarter
news.summary: Ford will report a pretax charge of $600 million in its fourth quarter results. The charge is due to adjustments to employee pension plans and other postretirement benefits.

news.title: Gold and Silver tumble as Trump's Fed Chair pick Warsh seen as preserving central bank independence
news.summary: Gold and silver prices plunged on Friday, following weeks of gains as investors poured money into safe havens. Gold and silver Prices plunged on Thursday and Friday, respectively.

news.title: Trump backs Senate government funding deal that includes DHS extension
news.summary: President Donald Trump's endorsement of a Senate spending deal will likely pave the way to its passage. The deal would avert another lengthy government shutdown. The Senate is expected to vote on the bill this week.

news.title: Hollywood has an IP problem: Box office sales are banking on franchise hits that keep falling flat
news.summary: Big-name installments like "Wicked: For Good" and "Avatar: Fire and Ash" have been underperforming ticket sales expectations.

news.title: Exxon, Chevron are producing record amounts of oil, but lower prices led to lower earnings
news.summary: The two U.S. integrated giants reported quarterly earnings with Venezuela in focus. The two companies reported quarterly results with Venezuela as a focus.

news.title: This Trump trade returned 29% in six months — but its authors say it’s time for a big change.
news.summary: Miners and rare earth plays boosted gains for a strategy devised by Ned Davis Research. The strategy was devised to help investors make money on rare earths.

news.title: Most of us make assumptions about growth and value stocks. Here’s what we get wrong.
news.summary: Reading too much into short-term market moves can land you in trouble. Read more at CNN.com/sport and follow CNN Living on Facebook and Twitter.

news.title: Amex sees strong travel and luxury spending as affluent customers open their wallets
news.summary: Amex sees spending rise, as its cardholders are ‘enjoying life’ and getting ready to travel. Amex: ‘Our customers are spending more because they’re enjoying life.’

news.title: This is the No. 1 thing Americans worry about being able to afford in retirement — and it’s not food or housing
news.summary: Some say worries will impact how they vote in the midterm elections. Some say they are worried about the economy and how it will affect their vote.
